Package it.polimi.ingsw.View.User

Class InputController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.View.User.InputController
public abstract class InputController
extends java.lang.Object
InputController Class is used to check the input given by the player to ensure that the Controller can operate on the messages without Runtime errors. Each method checks a different message.

      Checks if the client is trying to connect to an illegal address
      Parameters:
      address - the address the user has inserted

    • portValidator

      public static boolean portValidator​(int port)
      Checks if the user wants to connect to a reserved port or an illegal port
      Parameters:
      port - the port the user is trying to establish a connection to

    • nameValidator

      Returns:
